lines.text: If you try to look down my shirt one more time, I'm leaving.
I'm just trying to refresh my memory.
I know what you're trying to refresh, and it isn't your memory, get down!
I told you, it's that voodoo book you're researching, that stuff can seriously screw up your karma.
I'm sure that's it. Maybe I should write a horror novel on passive resistance instead.
What do you know about snakes?
Talk to the coffee? Even Gabriel isn't that addicted.
Gabriel's mini-stereo isn't exactly high-fidelity. Then again, neither is he.
Have you ever called the hair club for men?
I'd rather have NO hair than YOUR hair, Knight.
